scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/public && cp -r public/* dist/public/ && npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n esbuild,server "esbuild src/client.ts --bundle --sourcemap --outfile=dist/public/app.js --watch" "nodemon --watch dist --ext js --exec node dist/server.js"
